# JWT Check Server
This http server will handle requests to check a JWT Token against a JWK.

## Examples

GET Request

        curl --request GET 'http://localhost:10901/checkjwt?jwt=eyJraWQiOiI1M2FhYjg2Zi0zZTlhLTRlOTAtODJjMS0xYzQ3OGM1Zjg4OTMiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9..spMUC52euVqgx444E48RatfxF_WI_C1IKVOOHgUTYW85xl2Qb3pvdq3Zc1c99hD1xOP_YEn2eyYUOXn-jb-NJLLISNSH-G0NpLhSnJgrKc4z_F_Loqx7qky9gHiUc5YQtvYOtwwIdrwRW7br_4CYAiqIrZvdDyGzfe5TGgwcM70lm7kaLchR5TRvcpq8_sWfJ3P57FyQjf8YrWyIaPxdXYKqmcSGdhsteL4mxvYplDBcBOkeMSPKxX9I5x3tORBAchXsLl5b0CLMXFgs8RUQmJNPD25QvbvzvL7ZOGFEY12McsmZ_y5-PSVO0WyTmn5iOiWYlpR27oKIpQjx12_u8w'

POST Request

        curl --request POST 'http://localhost:10901/checkjwt'
        --data-raw 'eyJraWQiOiI1M2FhYjg2Zi0zZTlhLTRlOTAtODJjMS0xYzQ3OGM1Zjg4OTMiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9..spMUC52euVqgx444E48RatfxF_WI_C1IKVOOHgUTYW85xl2Qb3pvdq3Zc1c99hD1xOP_YEn2eyYUOXn-jb-NJLLISNSH-G0NpLhSnJgrKc4z_F_Loqx7qky9gHiUc5YQtvYOtwwIdrwRW7br_4CYAiqIrZvdDyGzfe5TGgwcM70lm7kaLchR5TRvcpq8_sWfJ3P57FyQjf8YrWyIaPxdXYKqmcSGdhsteL4mxvYplDBcBOkeMSPKxX9I5x3tORBAchXsLl5b0CLMXFgs8RUQmJNPD25QvbvzvL7ZOGFEY12McsmZ_y5-PSVO0WyTmn5iOiWYlpR27oKIpQjx12_u8w'



## History
- 1.00 - 2022-12-26 - First version
- 1.10 - 2023-02-02 - POST request implemented to support larger keys
